name: Bunny Mary
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'lime wedge'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'celery seed'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'carrot juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'vodka'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'hot sauce'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'prepared horseradish'}
steps: Place celery seed on a plate. Moisten the rim of a glass with a lime wedge. Dip rim in celery seed until coated. Set aside.. Fill a shaker with ice. Add carrot juice, vodka, lime juice, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco, and horseradish. Shake until well combined. Pour into the prepared glass.

name: Al's Bloody Marys
ingredients: {'quantity': '16', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'vodka'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'tomato juice (such as Sacramento®)'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'tomato and clam juice cocktail (such as Clamato®)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'prepared horseradish, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'finely ground black pepper, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'celery salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, cut into wedges, or as needed'}
steps: Combine vodka, tomato juice, tomato and clam juice, lemon juice, lime juice, Worcestershire sauce, horseradish, black pepper, pepper sauce, and celery salt in a large pitcher. Add ice and pour cocktail into glasses; serve each with a lime wedge.

name: Dill Pickle Bloody Mary
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'dill pickle juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'sriracha salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'celery seed'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'vegetable juice (such as V8®)'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vodka'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'freshly squeezed lime juice'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'powdered horseradish'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': '4 bamboo skewers'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'pickled eggs'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'pickled okra spears'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'dill pickles'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice cubes'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'celery stalks'}
steps: Pour dill pickle juice into a shallow plate. Combine sriracha salt, celery seed, and black pepper on another shallow plate.. One-by-one, dip the rims of 4 glasses first into the dill pickle juice and then into the salt mixture to coat the rims. Place glasses into the refrigerator or freezer. Pour remaining dill pickle juice and salt mixture into a large pitcher. Add vegetable juice, vodka, lime juice, horseradish powder, and hot sauce. Mix well. Allow Bloody Mary mixture to rest for at least 1 hour in the refrigerator.. Slide 1 pickled egg, 1 pickled okra spear, and 1 dill pickle onto each bamboo skewer.. Before serving, add 2 two ice cubes, 1 loaded bamboo skewer, and 1 celery stalk to each rimmed glass. Give the Bloody Mary pitcher a stir and pour evenly into the 4 prepared glasses. Serve immediately.

name: True Wisconsin Bloody Mary
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice cubes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1.5 fluid ounce) jigger', 'name': 'vodka'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'pimento-stuffed green olives'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'brine from olive jar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'celery salt, plus more for garnish'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': "hot pepper sauce (e.g. Texas Pete's)"}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'tomato and clam juice cocktail'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'stalk', 'name': 'celery, with leaves'}
steps: Fill a large tumbler with ice cubes. Pour in vodka, then add olives and brine. Season with celery salt, pepper, Worcestershire sauce, and hot pepper sauce. Top with tomato and clam juice cocktail. Stir with celery stalk and leave in as a garnish. Sprinkle with additional celery salt before serving.

name: Bloody Maria
ingredients: {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'Tajin®)'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'tomato juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'tequila'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'hot sauce'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'prepared horseradish'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'celery seed'}

Add tomato juice, tequila, lime juice, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco, horseradish, and celery seed. Shake until the outside of shaker is frosted; strain into the prepared glass.

name: Bloody Caesar

steps: Sprinkle celery salt onto a plate. Moisten the rim of a glass with lime wedge. Press the moistened rim into the salt. Fill glass with ice.. Sprinkle in a pinch of celery salt, then garnish with lime wedge, celery stick and other preferred garnishes.

name: Spicy Red Snapper (Bloody Mary with Gin)
ingredients: {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice cubes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'tomato juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'dry gin'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'hot pepper sauce'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'brine from olive jar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'hot chili powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground cumin'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'celery salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'fresh-ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'prepared horseradish'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'celery stalk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'dill pickle'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'stuffed green olives'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'wedge', 'name': 'lemon'}
steps: Place ice cubes into a cocktail shaker, and pour in tomato juice, gin, lemon juice, hot sauce, and Worcestershire sauce. Season with chili powder, garlic powder, cumin, celery salt, pepper, and horseradish. Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Pour contents (including ice) into a 12 ounce highball glass. Garnish with celery, pickle, olives, and lemon wedge before serving.

steps: Rim a glass with lime, kosher salt and chili powder.. Fill the glass with ice and add ingredients. Mix the ingredients thoroughly, then garnish with a fresh celery stick and lime wedge and enjoy!

name: Ripley's Bloody Mary Mix for Canning
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'dried chile de arbol peppers'}, {'quantity': '20', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'tomatoes, chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'onions, chopped'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'green bell peppers, chopped'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'carrots, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'jalapeno pepper, chopped'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(8 ounce) cans', 'name': 'tomato sauce'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vinegar'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'prepared horseradish'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'kosher salt'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'bay leaves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'celery seed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': '', 'name': '(1 quart) sterilized canning jars with lids and rings'}
steps: Grind chile de arbol peppers into a powder with a mortar and pestle.. Process tomatoes, onions, green bell peppers, carrots, jalapeno pepper, and garlic in a food processor, working in batches, until vegetables are finely chopped. Transfer vegetables to a large pot.. Stir tomato sauce, vinegar, horseradish, ground chile de arbol peppers, kosher salt, Worcestershire sauce, black pepper, bay leaves, celery seed, seafood seasoning, and hot pepper sauce into the vegetables. Bring mixture to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until vegetables are tender, about 30 minutes, stirring regularly. Remove bay leaves.. Process the mixture through a vegetable juicer, working in batches if necessary. Strain excess pulp from the juice if desired. Pour juice into a large pot, set over medium heat, and heat until juice is nearly boiling. Stir in lemon juice.. Sterilize jars and lids in boiling water for at least 5 minutes. Pack the bloody mary mix into the hot, sterilized jars, filling the jars to within 1/4 inch of the top. Run a knife or a thin spatula around the insides of the jars after they have been filled to remove any air bubbles. Wipe the rims of the jars with a moist paper towel to remove any food residue. Top with lids, and screw on rings.. Place a rack in the bottom of a large stockpot or canning kettle and fill halfway with water. Bring to a boil and lower jars into the boiling water using a holder. Leave a 2-inch space between the jars. Pour in more boiling water if necessary to bring the water level to at least 1 inch above the tops of the jars. Bring the water to a rolling boil, cover the pot, and process for 40 minutes (or 35 minutes if using pint-sized jars).. Remove the jars from the pot and place onto a cloth-covered or wood surface, several inches apart, until cool. Once cool, press the top of each lid with a finger, ensuring that the seal is tight (lid does not move up or down at all). Store in a cool, dark area.

name: How to Build the Ultimate Bloody Mary Bar
The Ultimate Shaken Bloody Mary

name: Dani's Butt Kickin' Bloody Mary Mix

name: Dilly Bloody Mary
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chili-lime seasoning, such as Tajin®), or to taste'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime wedges, divided'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ice cubes, or as needed, divided'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'bottled Bloody Mary mix (such as Zing Zang®)'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'kosher pickle juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'vodka'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'dashes', 'name': 'hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon wedges, divided'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'sprigs', 'name': 'fresh dill'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'dill pickle spear'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon wedge'}
steps: Pour chili-lime seasoning onto a small plate. Rub the edge of a pint-sized jar with 1 lime wedge. Dip the edge of the jar into the seasoning. Fill jar with 1 cup ice and set aside.. Fill a cocktail shaker with remaining cup of ice, Bloody Mary mix, pickle juice, vodka, Worcestershire, and hot sauce. Squeeze in 1 lime wedge and 1 lemon wedge.. Roughly chop 1 fresh dill sprig and add to the shaker. Place lid on the shaker and shake for 10 seconds to combine. Strain into the prepared jar and garnish with pickle spear and remaining dill, lime, and lemon.
